ygData.subject: RE: Bard quests
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve gotten the arms.  Karnek has the pants, and I saw another bard sporting the helm.  Only problem I ve heard about is with the breastplate.  I m going to
ygData.messageBody:
I've gotten the arms. Karnek has the pants, and I saw another bard sporting
the helm. Only problem I've heard about is with the breastplate. I'm going
to try the boots tonight probably (whoo hoo! got another lambent stone), so
we'll see what happens. I'm guessing its just the BP.
Genni is definately in the temple, I don't remember the location, but I was
able to deal with him. He's in a seperate location from the bards.


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: John Robertson [mailto:johnr@...]
Sent: Friday, October 15, 1999 1:27 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Bard quests


From: John Robertson <johnr@...>


Last night I acquired the fixin's for two of the bard quests (arms and
boots), but when I got to the Temple, another bard told me that all the
bard quests were broken, according to a GM, and that nobody could find
Genni, the person who makes the lambent gems, anyway.

Did people have trouble making any of the pieces of armour besides the
previously mentioned breastplate problems?

Jyzan, Karana

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
